passives.name: Snakebite & Lash Extension
passives.desc:
When using Snakebite & Lash:
 • Large BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Triggers additional HP attack if BRV is at least 100% of MAX after last hit
 • Higher turn rate when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
passives.short_desc: Snakebite & Lash Extension: Boost to Snakebite & Lash

passives.name: Debuffed Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRV、 ATK while an enemy is debuffed
passives.short_desc: Debuffed Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Elementalash Extension
passives.desc:
Elementalash use +1

When using Elementalash:
 • Becomes 3-hit BRV attack; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Self: 6 turns ATK Up I
 • Higher turn rate when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break

After using Elementalash:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (火氷雷 melee BRV attack; slight BRV damage boost) for 6 turns
passives.short_desc: Elementalash Extension: Boost to Elementalash

passives.name: Destruction Brilliance
passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Destruction Brilliance: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Debuff Attack Up Extension
passives.desc: When using Debuff Attack Up:\n • Slight boost to raised ATK when attacking debuffed targets
passives.short_desc: Debuff Attack Up Extension: Boost to Debuff Attack Up

passive.name: Debuff Attack Up Growth
passive.desc: Debuff Attack Up use +1\n\nDebuff Attack Up effect duration +2
passive.short_desc: Debuff Attack Up Growth: Boost to Debuff Attack Up

passive.short_desc: Binding Thorns: May equip Sadistic Spikes

passives.name: Mighty Sadistic Spikes
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Sadistic Spikes
passives.short_desc: Mighty Sadistic Spikes: Increases BRV damage dealt with Sadistic Spikes

passives.short_desc: Sadistic Spikes Recast Up: Raises recast speed of Sadistic Spikes

passives.name: Binding Thorns HP+
passives.desc: While equipping EX weapon Sleipnir Tail ((T0)) or passive ability Binding Thorns:\n • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (melee BRV attack + HP attack; extra damage to targets afflicted with Snakebite; increases target's active Snakebite level by 1)
passives.short_desc: Binding Thorns HP+: Enables HP Attack+

passive.name: Binding Thorns Extension
passive.desc: Boost to EX ability Sadistic Spikes
passive.short_desc: Binding Thorns Extension: Boost to Sadistic Spikes

passives.name: Sadistic Spikes Rush Breaksight & Lash Recovery++
passives.desc:
When using Sadistic Spikes:
 • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
 • Snakebite & Lash use +1 (with upper limit) after use

HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
passives.short_desc: Sadistic Spikes Rush Breaksight & Lash Recovery++: Boost to Sadistic Spikes; enables HP Attack++

passives.name: Binding Thorns Extension Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: While equipping EX+ weapon Sleipnir Tail ((T0))+ or passive ability Binding Thorns Extension:\n • Moderately raises MAX BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Binding Thorns Extension Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Sadistic Spikes Debuff Plus Snakebite & Lash Battle Starting
passives.desc:
When using Sadistic Spikes:
 • Target: 6 turns 2 levels of Snakebite (limit 3)

At start of battle:
 • Random target: 6 turns 1 level of Snakebite (limit 3)
 • Self: 8 turns MAX BRV Up II
passives.short_desc: Sadistic Spikes Debuff Plus Snakebite & Lash Battle Starting: Boost to Sadistic Spikes

passives.name: Sadistic Spikes BRV Hit Plus Force Advance
passives.desc: When using Sadistic Spikes:\n • Total BRV attack hit count increased by 6; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage\n • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Sadistic Spikes BRV Hit Plus Force Advance: Boost to Sadistic Spikes
